name: kangaskhanite
effect: Held: Allows Kangaskhan to Mega Evolve into Mega Kangaskhan.
short_effect: Held: Allows Kangaskhan to Mega Evolve into Mega Kangaskhan.

flavor_text_entries.x-y:
One variety of the mysterious Mega Stones.
Have Kangaskhan hold it, and this stone will
enable it to Mega Evolve during battle.
